msItem.title: Hagadah shel Pesaḥ הגדה של פסח

collation.p: 6 quires: i-v8 (folios 1-40), vi8+1 (folios 41-49). No catchwords, but at the end of each quire the first word of the following quire is written in a truncated form.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Ashkenazi square and Ashkenazi semi-cursive script, main text punctuated, commentary not punctuated, of mid-15th century. Yoʾel ben Shimʻon Feibush, illuminator: inscribed with his name in the colophon (folio 48v).
